This could only occur because of the following line of code returning null 
which the API does not specify as being able to return null.


TestPlugin.getDefault().getDescriptor().getInstallURL();

I will leave this open but I am not sure how it happened.

closing as worksforme. Please reopen if you can replicate with the current 
code.
